text: Ceroplesis hintzi is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Breuning in 1937. It is known from the Democratic Republic of the Congo.BioLib.cz - Ceroplesis hintzi. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Ceroplesis Category:Beetles described in 1937
title: Ceroplesis hintzi
